jrobots.simulation.scenario

Interface SimulationMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DuelMode, RaceMode

    public interface SimulationMode
    Contest scenario variability

    • Method Detail

      • determinePointsForRanking

        void determinePointsForRanking()
        PRELIM the SimulationMode determines the points to achieve for every participant. TODO call at end of match TODO implement points for ranking

      • drawLandscape

        void drawLandscape(ArenaController arenaController,
                   javax.media.opengl.GL gl,
                   Vector drawableSize,
                   SimulationRun simulationRun,
                   int simulationStateIndex)
        As SimulationModes have different Landscapes, drawing the background is their obligation.
        Parameters:
        arenaController - - for drawing
        gl - - drawing routines need that
        drawableSize - - size of canvas
        simulationStateIndex - - index of the SimulationState within the entire SimulationRun that should be drawn by this call
        simulationRun - - the entire run, because sometimes we need to access more than the current state, which should be drawn

      • getAdditiveAcceleration

        Vector getAdditiveAcceleration(Body body,
                               TerrainType surface)
        An opportunity to add a static force, which is valid over the current frame
        Parameters:
        body - - for position
        surface - - yet unused
        Returns:
        delta acceleration to be added at motion target creation; global axes; may return null

      • hookCollisionDetection

        void hookCollisionDetection(java.util.LinkedList<Collision> collisions,
                            java.util.List<MotionTargetPanzer> motionTargets)
        This hook is called at every simulation frame. It enables continual effects individual for the SimulationMode in the running Simulation.
        Parameters:
        collisions - - to be filled
        motionTargets - - to be read

      • hookSimulationCycle

        This hook is called at every simulation frame. It enables continual effects individual for the SimulationMode in the running Simulation.
        Parameters:
        currentState -

      • nextCameraMode

        void nextCameraMode(SimulationState currentState)
        Changes the camera mode
        Parameters:
